data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Minnesota prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Minnesota, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,489,336 believers in Minnesota, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Minnesota.
God, we pray both the men and women of Minnesota, United States will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Somali people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Somali people.
Father, we pray that the people of Minnesota, United States will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Minnesota against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the state of Minnesota, United States has a population of 5,640,100.

We estimate Minnesota has 1,489,336 people who might know Jesus, 2,824,827 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,325,937 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Minnesota, United States to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
